exact_source: AuKing will have the right to earn a 50% interest in the total package of assets (comprising the Cloncurry Gold Project) that are being acquired by Orion by spending $5M on Cloncurry Gold Project development activities... on or before 30 June 2027. (This is a revision increasing interest from a previous 15% earned by spending A$1.5M. So the additional spend is A$3.5M. A$3.5M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 2,450,000).
